alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 9:20PM EST until January 12 at 9:45PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Coffee County in southeastern Georgia... North central Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Bacon County in southeastern Georgia... Southeastern Jeff Davis County in southeastern Georgia... Appling County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 945 PM EST. * At 920 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Graham to 8 miles northeast of Pearson, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Baxley, Alma, Graham, Plant Hatch, Nicholls, West Green, Denton, New Lacy and Pine Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Ware
